skins.name: Zhezhi
skins.description: A picturesque outfit that puts one in mind of an exquisite painting. Landscapes abound, waiting to be recaptured on canvas.

tags.name: Resonance Liberation Regeneration
tags.description: Restores the Resonance Energy of a specific Resonator in the team

tags.name: Glacio DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides Glacio DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

tags.name: Resonance Skill DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides Resonance Skill DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

133.name: Brushwork's Finish
133.description: Casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Creation's Zenith</color> restores {0} Resonance Energy and increases Crit. Rate by {1} for {2}s.

134.name: Vivid Strokes
134.description: Max <color=Highlight>Inklit Spirits</color> summoned by Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Living Canvas</color> increases by {0}.

135.name: Reflection's Grace
135.description: Casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Manifestation</color>, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Stroke of Genius</color>, or Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Creation's Zenith</color> increases ATK by {0} for {2}s, stacking up to {1} time(s).

136.name: Hue's Spectrum
136.description: Casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Living Canvas</color> increases ATK of Resonators on the team {0} for {1}s.

137.name: Composition's Clue
137.description: For every 3 <color=Highlight>Inklit Spirits</color> summoned by Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Living Canvas</color>, 1 extra <color=Highlight>Inklit Spirit</color> is summoned to perform a Coordinated Attack, dealing DMG equal to {0} of Inklit Spirit's DMG, considered as Basic Attack DMG. This damage dealt will not further summon Inklit Spirit.

138.name: Infinite Legacy
138.description: Casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Stroke of Genius</color> or Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Creation's Zenith</color> summons an extra <color=Highlight>Ivory Herald</color> to deal DMG equal to {0} of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Stroke of Genius</color>'s DMG, considered as Basic Attack DMG.

params.name: Dimming Brush
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform an attack, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
Heavy Attack does not reset the Basic Attack cycle.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform up to 2 consecutive attacks while in mid-air, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
Use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> after a successful <color=Highlight>Dodge</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.

params.name: Manifestation
params.description:
Deal <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>. If <te href=850028>Afflatus</te> is no less than 60, consume 60 Afflatus to summon <color=Highlight><te href=850026>Phatasmic Imprint</te> - Left</color> and <color=Highlight>Phantasmic Imprint - Right</color>.
-Press the button on the ground to summon the Phantasmic Imprints on the ground.
-Hold the button on the ground or press the button in mid-air to summon the Phantasmic Imprints in mid-air.

params.name: Living Canvas
params.description:
Summon <color=Highlight>Inklit Spirits</color> for assistance.
Can be cast in mid-air.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Inklit Spirit</color></size>
When the active Resonator deals DMG, an <color=Highlight>Inklit Spirit</color> will be summoned to perform a Coordinated Attack, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>, considered as Basic Attack DMG.
-For {0}s after dealing DMG, 1 <color=Highlight>Inklit Spirit</color> is summoned per second. This effect can trigger once per second. Damage dealt by an Inklit Spirit does not trigger this effect.
-Up to {1} <color=Highlight>Inklit Spirit</color> can be summoned every second, and up to {2} in total.
-This effect lasts for {3}s, or until max <color=Highlight>Inklit Spirits</color> are summoned.

params.name: Calligrapher's Touch
params.description: When casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Stroke of Genius</color> or Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Creation's Zenith</color>, ATK is increased by {0} for {2}s. This can be stacked up to {1} time(s).

params.name: Flourish
params.description: After Outro Skill is cast, restore {0} Resonance Energy for the incoming Resonator.

params.name: Ink and Wash
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Phantasmic Imprint</color></size>
Zhezhi may summon <color=Highlight>Phantasmic Imprints</color> at the cost of Afflatus when casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Manifestation</color> or Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Conjuration</color>.
Up to 1 of each of <color=Highlight>Phantasmic Imprint - Left</color>, <color=Highlight>Phantasmic Imprint - Middle</color>, and <color=Highlight>Phantasmic Imprint - Right</color> can exist at the same time, each lasting for {0}s.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Conjuration</color></size>
The 5 moves below consume STA to perform <color=Highlight>Conjuration</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
-Hold the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack button</color> shortly after <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color>.
-Press the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack button</color> shortly after casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Manifestation</color>.
-Hold the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack button</color> shortly after casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Stroke of Genius</color> or Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Creation's Zenith</color>.
-Hold the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack button</color> while in mid-air.
-Hold the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack button</color> after a successful <color=Highlight>Dodge</color>.
If Zhezhi has at least 30 Afflatus when performing any of these, consume 30 Afflatus to summon a <color=Highlight>Phantasmic Imprint - Middle</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Resonance Skill - Stroke of Genius</color></size>
When a <color=Highlight>Phatasmic Imprint</color> is nearby, the Resonance Skill is replaced with <color=Highlight>Stroke of Genius</color>, which can be cast while in mid-air. When it is cast, Zhezhi will:
-Move to the location of the <color=Highlight>Phatasmic Imprint</color>, remove it, and then summon an Ivory Herald to attack the target, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>, considered as Basic Attack DMG. Refresh the mid-air Dodge attempts if the target <color=Highlight>Phatasmic Imprint</color> is in mid-air.
-Gain 1 stack of Painter's Delight, lasting for {1}s and stacking up to 2 times.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Resonance Skill - Creation's Zenith</color></size>
When a <color=Highlight>Phantasmic Imprint</color> is nearby and there are 2 stacks of Painter's Delight, <color=Highlight>Stroke of Genius</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Creation's Zenith</color>, which can be cast while in mid-air. When it is cast, Zhezhi will:
-Lose all stacks of Painter's Delight
-Move to the location of the <color=Highlight>Phantasmic Imprint</color>, remove it, and then summon an Ivory Herald to attack the target, dealing greater <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>, considered as Basic Attack DMG, additionally increasing the Basic Attack DMG Bonus by {2} for {3}s. Refresh the mid-air Dodge attempts if the target <color=Highlight>Phatasmic Imprint</color> is in mid-air.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Afflatus</color></size>
Zhezhi can hold up to 90 Afflatus.
Normal Attacks grant Afflatus on hit.
Casting Intro Skill grants Afflatus.

params.name: Carve and Draw
params.description: The incoming Resonator has their Glacio DMG Amplified by {0} and Resonance Skill DMG Amplified by {1} for {2}s or until they are switched out.

params.name: Tune Break: Rectifier
params.description: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
